title: Bing!!!
content: When I use Firefox on my Mac, no matter what I have tried it keeps defaulting to the dreaded Bing Search Engine. I understand it has to do with Microsoft, but I don't use any of their products because I don't like them. In settings/search I can restore the default search engines & delete Bing, but it always reverts back to insisting on using Bing again. I have followed several threads about this issue without permanent resolution. Help??
creator: kathycasey

title: How do I restore local browser cache?
content: How do I restore local browser cache from last month? I can't system restore because I don't see previous restore points.

title: never sent email with code to authorise login to my account after samsung copied all data to new phone.
content: I used Samsung smart switch to transfer data to new phone. When I tried to sync Firefox on new phone with my PC, old phone and tablet I was asked to type in the authorisation code. No matter how I have set my e-mail accounts no e-mail is received in my spam folder or in-box. There is no way to contact Mozilla to resolve this. I have not received any e-mail to state that my sign in was blocked for security reasons nor have I received an error code. I setup a bugzilla account and tried to request that my account be unlocked but there was no way to do this. All it has done is to create an entry that I reported "Zarro Boogs found". How do I get my account unblocked as the advice on the help pages is no advice. Please reply to robert@goodhart.info
creator: robert148

title: Sito Enigas non funziona il Login
content:
Salve, ho un problema con il sito enigas che non funziona correttamente al login ... ( https://eniplenitude.com/my-eni ) ... Pur inserendo user-id e pwd, non va avanti ed inoltre non mostra le altre opzioni di accesso.

Con browser EDGE è tutto ok. Questione di compatibilità o cos'altro potrebbe essere ? (Firefox è aggiornato,ver. 99.0.1)

Grazie mille
creator: l.urbani

title: Restoring Synced Data After Accidental Deletion
content: Hello there, I somehow recently managed to delete my account by accident and I'm wondering whether it's possible to restore the sync data left behind, I have access to the recovery keys if required and can attempt to provide any information requested about the account. Not sure if it is even possible to restore the data using this method but it's worth a try at least. Appreciative of any assistance with this problem, thanks again :).
creator: Aldraxic

title: conta no sync
content: não preciso de ajuda. Esse apenas é um comunicado de que eu estou desistindo de usar o serviço “sync”, que seria útil. Eu esqueci a password. A *cada* tentativa, é preciso acessar o email e colocar um código grande de autorização. A cada tentativa. A seguir, quando tento colocar uma senha que consiga lembrar, a qual tem: letra maiúscula, símbolo e número, ainda assim não atende às exigências de segurança do Firefox, que eu considero um browser - e uma proposta - excelente. Uma pena. Todas as minhas senhas consigo configurar em todas as plataformas, absolutamente todas, exceto no Firefox. Mas o que me fez desistir é o alerta de que posso perder meus favoritos, colecionados durante ANOS, organizados por assuntos, e são centenas. Desisto. O sync parece ser para os profissionais.
creator: fabionin

title: Netflix, Twitch, HBOMax aren't playing video
content: I've tried using the websites in the title all day and none of them work at all. Netfilx gives me the 7701 error code, Twitch gives me the error #4000, and HBOMax and Disney+ stay loading. I've tried a lot of the solutions I've seen (turn on and off the drm player, delete cookies, reset cache, refreash firefox, uninstalling and reinstalling firefox, updating drivers, removing all addons) and none of them have worked. The same thing happens with Opera. I've tried using Chrome and that seems to be working well so I don't think it has to do witth my computer.
creator: ditobobito

content:

But none of this solved the problem. Thanks

title: Is there a way to disable Handoff on Firefox for macOS?
content: I need handoff enabled on macOS and iOS in order to copy and paste items from my Mac to iPad using Universal Control (I checked by seeing the cross device clipboard not working when either is turned off). I want handoff disabled in Firefox only, shouldn't there be a way to disable it within Firefox? Seeing Firefox tabs randomly automatically show up in Safari on my iPad is annoying and spam.
